title: 2112 SOLSTICE TEE
desc: Rush’s 1976 album, 2112, the greatest concept album of all time. That’s just our humble opinion of course.
features: Printed on 100% cotton Gildan SoftStyle.

title: ROLL THE BONES KICKMAN TEE
desc: Not every tee has to be black, right?
features: Printed on Carolina Blue, 100% cotton Gildan SoftStyle.

title: ROLL THE BONES KICKMAN HOODY
desc: Stylish Roll The Bones design on a heavyweight hoody.
features: Printed on Gunmetal Heather, 80/20 cotton/poly Independent Trading Style 4000. For exact sizing, please search style name and number.

title: SIGNALS 40 RAGLAN
desc: A celebratory raglan for the 40th Anniversary of the album, Signals.
features: The 80’s brings back a lot of great memories for music, fashion, hairstyles.
Some of those we’re holding onto, some not.
90% ringspun cotton, 10% polyester.
For exact sizing, search Tultex style #245

title: RUSH 1974 BOMBER JACKET
desc: A lightweight Rush Bomber for spring.
features: 100% polyester, single layer, with interior water resistant coating.
Pockets on the side.
For exact sizing, please see attached size chart.

title: COUNTERPARTS PATCH LONGSLEEVE
desc: This is the original design from way back on the Counterparts Tour.
features: A 100% cotton longsleeve, with a woven patch with the nut & bolt, and RUSH embroidered above.
Printed on 100% cotton Next Level Apparel.

title: R40 WASHED TRI-LOGO HOODY
desc: This artwork is from the Neil Peart stage tees collection, from the R40 Tour.
features: Printed on the front, and sleeve.
This is printed on a soft-washed, ring spun, 80/20 cotton/poly hoody from Comfort Colors.
This is garment-dyed, which means it has that lived-in, washed-out feel.

title: RUSH LUXURY BATHROBE
desc: Decadent Turkish cotton bathrobe for lounging around the house.
features: Embroidered skull logo on the front chest, and embroidered RUSH 1974 on the hood.
Two side pockets, belt with loops, and custom Rush labels inside also.
This robe comes in two sizes, and we recommend the larger size for anyone over 5’9” in height.
100% Turkish Cotton Terry.

title: AFTK 40TH KINGS HOODY
desc: The Kings Hoody is one of the all time, longest-standing designs Rush has had in the product line.
features: A classic design from A Farewell To Kings, with this issue being a 40th Anniversary version.
Printed on the front and back, and an embroidered Starman on the front near the pocket.
Fabric is cotton/poly blend.

title: NAVY STENCIL STARMAN TEE
desc: The Starman is looking good on this navy blue tee.
features: This tee is printed on 100% cotton Gildan SoftStyle or similar.

title: WOMEN'S ORIGINAL T-SHIRT
desc: The classic Rush logo from the first album.
features: Printed on 100% cotton Next Level Apparel 1510 with slightly scoopy neck.

title: YOUTH SIGNALS TEE
desc: When you are a kid, you can get away with a Signals design on blue.
features: Printed on 100% cotton.

title: YOUTH ORIGINAL TEE
desc: Kids these days…they just love Rush!
features: Printed on Next Level 100% ring-spun cotton.

title: STARMAN MESHBACK BASEBALL HAT
desc: A classic Rush Starman hat.
features: Customized inside and out, this hat features the embroidered Starman on the front.
Adjustable snapback.

title: SIGNALS BUCKET HAT
desc: At anytime of the year, summer is just around the corner.
features: At least that’s how we view it in Canada.
Customized inside and out, this bucket hat is adorned with embroidered Signals art, featuring the beloved dalmatian.
100% cotton.
One size fits all.

title: RUSH COUNTERPARTS DAD HAT
desc: There are a whole lot of Dads who love Rush.
features: Moms can wear this too of course.​
100% cotton, with adjustable closure on back.
The Counterparts logo is an embroidered patch, sewn on the hat, and an embroidered RUSH on the back.
The inside of the hat also features custom Rush label and taping.

title: RUSH FRAMED GOLD ALBUM ROLL THE BONES
desc: This framed collectible celebrates the 1991 release, Roll The Bones.
features: Finished size is 18” X 22”.
This product will ship directly from the supplier, Frameworth, in Canada.

title: RUSH FRAMED PLATINUM ALBUM SIGNALS
desc: This framed collectible celebrates the 1982 release, Signals.
features: Finished size is 18” X 22”.
This product will ship directly from the supplier, Frameworth, in Canada.

title: RUSH FRAMED B/W PHOTO COLLAGE WITH PLATINUM LP
desc: This framed collectible features a photo collage, along with a platinum color LP and engraved metal plate. The plate reads, “GEDDY LEE – ALEX LIFESON – NEIL PEART 40TH ANNIVERSARY 1974-2014”.
features: Finished size is 22” X 34”.
This product will ship directly from the supplier, Frameworth, in Canada.
This item is printed and framed on demand.

title: RUSH GOLDEN ALE MUSTARD
desc: We have teamed up with our friends at Kozlik’s Mustard and Henderson Brewery, to produce a Rush Mustard! Kozlik’s are the Geniuses of Mustard, and they have added the Canadian Golden Ale into the mustard for a distinct flavor. Alex describes the adventure here.
features: Kozlik’s mustards are made with 100% Canadian mustard seed, non-GMO, gluten-free and contain no additives or preservatives.
Ingredients: Distilled Vinegar, Mustard Powder, Sugars(sugar, honey), Water, Rush Canadian Golden Ale (5.5% Alcohol by Volume), Salt,Natural Flavour.
Contains: Wheat, Mustard

title: RUSH XANABREW COASTER PACK
desc: Xanabrew is the Spring 2023 Limited Edition beer from Rush.
features: You can head over to Half Time to get your beer to go along with these coasters.​
These come in a pack of 10. The size of each coaster is 4” in diameter.

title: RUSH GOLDEN ALE KOOZIE
desc: Rush Golden Ale is best drunk cold. These tall-boy koozies will do their best to keep your beer chilly.
features: And yes we know how to spell “genuises”, but that wouldn’t be genius.
Printed on the front with the Golden Ale logo, and on the back with the genuis syaings.

title: RUSH BOBBLEHEAD DOLLS
desc: The beloved Rush Bobbles! At first when presenting this product concept to the band in 2002, Neil was not sure.
features: These dolls are polyresin ceramic, which is the highest quality bobblehead on the market.
Each set consists of three dolls (Geddy, Alex, and Neil) in a custom printed RUSH box.
These were designed with a 'vintage' Rush in mind, from the time when the band wore kimonos, played double neck guitars, and Neil had the most amazing moustache in rock music.

title: RUSH BLANKET
desc: Whether you want to hit the beach, have a picnic, cozy up on the sofa, or decorate a wall, this woven Rush blanket is a really fun piece.
features: Made in the USA
There are 20 different Rush logos woven right into the cotton fabric.
